Container.Name: CritterCatcherAI
Container.Overview: CritterCatcherAI v2.0 - Simplified animal detection using YOLO + CLIP. Create Animal Profiles, process Ring videos, review pending frames with multi-select UI, and optionally retrain models. Clean workflow: Profile → Process → Review → Confirm/Reject.

Config.Name: Ring Username
Config.Description: Your Ring account email address (optional - only if using Ring camera integration)

Config.Name: Ring Password
Config.Description: Your Ring account password (optional - only if using Ring camera integration)

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Container timezone (e.g., Europe/London, America/New_York, UTC). Important for correct timestamps. Log level is now configured in the Configuration tab within the Web UI.

Config.Name: NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
Config.Description: GPU UUID for Quadro RTX 4000. This restricts the container to use only this GPU, preventing conflicts with VMs using other GPUs. Found via 'nvidia-smi -L' on host.

Config.Name: Web Interface Port
Config.Description: Web GUI port - Animal Profiles, Review Images, Model Management

Config.Name: AppData Config
Config.Description: Configuration files and application settings (config.yaml, logs)

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Working data directory - animal profiles, review frames, training data, models, downloads, sorted videos
